data.comment: The match is underway in Toyota.
Kobe needs to be cautious. Nagoya have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 2, Throw-in Kobe.
Ball safe as Kobe is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Nagoya awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 5, Corner awarded to Kobe.
Nagoya drives forward and Mateus gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Mu Kanazaki for Nagoya drives towards goal at Toyota Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 11, Kobe have been awarded a corner by Nobutsugu Murakami.
Kobe have been awarded a corner by Nobutsugu Murakami.
Nobutsugu Murakami awards Kobe a goal kick.
In the minute 12, It's a goal kick for the home team in Toyota.
Nagoya have a dangerous throw-in.
Nobutsugu Murakami awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 14, Nobutsugu Murakami signals a free kick to Kobe in their own half.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Hotaru Yamaguchi.
Great play from Daigo Nishi to set up the goal.
In the minute 17, Kobe's Dyanfrez Douglas gets in a shot on goal at Toyota Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Goal kick for Nagoya at Toyota Stadium.
Throw-in for Nagoya in their own half.
In the minute 23, Free kick for Nagoya in their own half.
Nagoya's Mateus gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Kobe have a goal kick.
In the minute 28, Throw-in for Nagoya at Toyota Stadium.
Free kick for Kobe in the half of Nagoya.
Throw-in for Nagoya in their own half.
In the minute 32, Throw-in for Kobe close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Nagoya at Toyota Stadium.
Nagoya pushes forward through Mateus, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 35, Dyanfrez Douglas (Kobe) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a Kobe throw-in in Nagoya's half.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a free kick to Nagoya.
In the minute 36, Ball goes out of play for a Kobe goal kick.
Free kick Nagoya.
Ball safe as Kobe is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 38, Kobe awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kobe awarded a throw-in in their own half.
An attacking Nagoya player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
In the minute 41, At Toyota Stadium, Leo Osaki has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Goal! The home team are now level through a Mu Kanazaki penalty.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a free kick to Nagoya in their own half.
In the minute 43, Nagoya awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Toyota a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Kobe in their own half.
In the minute 45, Nobutsugu Murakami will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Corner awarded to Nagoya.
The first-half is over at Toyota Stadium.
In the minute 46, The second-half has just kicked-off.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a free kick to Nagoya.
Can Nagoya capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kobe's half?
In the minute 49, Kobe's Dyanfrez Douglas breaks free at Toyota Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Nagoya have a goal kick.
Throw-in Kobe.
In the minute 50, Throw-in for Kobe in the half of Nagoya.
Nagoya to take a throw-in in Kobe territory.
Throw-in high up the field for Nagoya in Toyota.
In the minute 53, Nobutsugu Murakami signals a throw-in for Nagoya, close to Kobe's area.
Corner awarded to Nagoya.
Nobutsugu Murakami awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 55, Nagoya have been awarded a penalty in Toyota...
Goal! Mu Kanazaki gives Nagoya the lead from the penalty spot. The score is now 2-1.
Free kick Kobe.
In the minute 58, Nobutsugu Murakami signals a throw-in for Kobe, close to Nagoya's area.
Can Nagoya get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kobe's half?
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Kobe close to the penalty box.
In the minute 63, The away team replace Hirofumi Watanabe with Yuta Goke.
Free kick for Nagoya in their own half.
Daigo Nishi (Kobe) has received a yellow card from Nobutsugu Murakami.
In the minute 65, Nobutsugu Murakami signals a free kick to Kobe in their own half.
Ball safe as Nagoya is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Toyota a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Dankler for Kobe has been booked by Nobutsugu Murakami and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 68, Sergi Samper (Kobe) gets a yellow card.
Nagoya advance rapidly upfield but Nobutsugu Murakami blows for offside.
In the minute 73, Nobutsugu Murakami awards the home team a throw-in.
Ryo Hatsuse is replacing Daigo Nishi for Kobe at Toyota Stadium.
Kobe make their third substitution with Noriaki Fujimoto replacing Sergi Samper.
Nagoya needs to be cautious. Kobe have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 75, Massimo Ficcadenti (Nagoya) is making a first substitution, with Hiroyuki Abe replacing Gabriel Xavier.
Yuki Soma is on a sub for Naoki Maeda for Nagoya.
In the minute 77, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball goes out of play for a Nagoya goal kick.
Kobe awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 80, Kobe to take a throw-in in Nagoya territory.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a Kobe throw-in in Nagoya's half.
Nagoya awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 81, The home team have replaced Mu Kanazaki with Ryogo Yamasaki. This is the third substitution made today by Massimo Ficcadenti.
Goal kick for Kobe at Toyota Stadium.
Nobutsugu Murakami awards Nagoya a goal kick.
In the minute 82, It's a goal kick for the away team in Toyota.
Nagoya have a dangerous throw-in.
Nagoya have been awarded a corner by Nobutsugu Murakami.
In the minute 84, Corner awarded to Nagoya.
Nobutsugu Murakami awards Kobe a goal kick.
Keijiro Ogawa is replacing Kyogo Furuhashi for the away team.
In the minute 86, Goal kick for Nagoya at Toyota Stadium.
Nagoya have been awarded a corner by Nobutsugu Murakami.
Corner awarded to Nagoya.
In the minute 89, Ball goes out of play for a Kobe goal kick.
Throw-in Kobe.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Toyota.
Throw-in for Kobe in their own half.
Can Nagoya capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kobe's half?
Nagoya have been awarded a corner by Nobutsugu Murakami.
Free kick for Kobe in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Nagoya in Toyota.
The match has come to a close in Toyota. The final score is 2-1.
